thread.title: Aston Villa man Leandro Bacuna has refused to apologise for his headbutt on the assistant referee which saw him being given a straight red card at Villa Park
thread.title_full: Aston Villa man Leandro Bacuna has refused to apologise for his headbutt on the assistant referee which saw him being given a straight red card at Villa Park

author: mheathsmith
title: Aston Villa man Leandro Bacuna has refused to apologise for his headbutt on the assistant referee which saw him being given a straight red card at Villa Park
text:
EFL Bac chest not sorry Aston Villa man Leandro Bacuna has refused to apologise for his headbutt on the assistant referee which saw him being given a straight red card at Villa Park 
The 23-year-old reacted angrily in the 1-0 win against Derby County, and he could now be given a four-match ban by graham hill
